projects.title: kordis.cloud Main Page
projects.bodyText:
- Engineered the cloud backend ensuring scalable, efficient operations.
 - Integrated React for dynamic, customizable front-end interactions.
 - Leveraged a robust AWS architecture including S3, DynamoDB, and more.

projects.title: Coming Soon Page
projects.bodyText:
- Customized a Next.js-based 'Coming Soon' page to enhance user engagement.
 - Utilized AWS Lambda and API Gateway to handle backend processes efficiently.
 - Integrated AWS S3 and DynamoDB for scalable storage and database solutions.

projects.title: Plants vs Animals
projects.bodyText:
- A tower defence game developed using Unity3D, focusing on engaging gameplay with strategic elements.
 - Deployed and managed the game on Google Play, optimizing for various devices.
 - Implemented Unity Monetization to optimize in-game advertising.
